title: Companion Approval Guide
content: the stage a second time by saying "Get on with it". Requirement/s: Ask Jaheira to go on stage Halsin + N/A Dribbles the Clown Circus of the Last Days - You can find Dribbles the Clown performing on stage for a crowd on the northern side of the Circus. When Dribbles the Clown asks you to come on stage choose Halsin instead. Requirement/s: Jaheira + Halsin Dribbles the Clown Circus of the Last Days - You can find Dribbles the Clown performing on stage for a crowd on the northern side of the Circu
